instructions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Bring water and margarine to boil in large saucepan. Stir in stuffing mix; cover. Remove from heat; let stand 5 min.
Stir egg and 1/2 cup of the cheese into stuffing mixture until blended. Spoon into greased 9-inch pie plate. Sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake 20 min. or until lightly brown and cheese on top is melted.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package STOVE TOP Savory Herbs Stuffing Mix
3/4 cup KRAFT Mexican Style Shredded Four Cheese
title: Baked Cheese Stuffing Casserole
